properties.name: server.application.url
properties.description: The application URL, this will be used for generating the web app's hostname.

properties.name: server.datasource.initialize
properties.description: Initializes the database with the required data to get up and running.  Included Roles, Permissions, Users, associations, business specific data, etc.

properties.name: cloud.aws.region.auto
properties.description: Enables automatic region detection based on the EC2 meta data service.

properties.name: cloud.aws.region.static
properties.description: Configures a static region for the application.

properties.name: cloud.aws.credentials.accessKey
properties.description: The access key to be used with a static provider.

properties.name: cloud.aws.credentials.secretKey
properties.description: The secret key to be used with a static provider.

properties.name: cloud.aws.credentials.instanceProfile
properties.description: Configures an instance profile credentials provider with no further configuration.

properties.name: cloud.aws.s3.bucket
properties.description: The name of the S3 bucket used for the web app.

properties.name: cloud.aws.stack.auto
properties.description: Enables the automatic stack name detection for the application.

properties.name: api.google.maps.key
properties.description: The Google Maps api key from Google API Console.

properties.name: api.google.recaptcha.key
properties.description: The Google reCaptcha server key used for server-side requests to validate a reCaptcha.

properties.name: handemdowns.security.adminAccount
properties.description: The name or email of the Handemdowns Master Admin account.

properties.name: handemdowns.security.adminPassword
properties.description: The password of the Handemdowns Master Admin account.

properties.name: cache.category.maximum.size
properties.description: The maximum amount of categories to cache.  This should just be the total amount of categories.

properties.name: cache.location.maximum.size
properties.description: The maximum amount of locations to cache.
